title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: When accessing the All types dialog in JDK 1.4, it shows obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd'. This makes it difficult to identify the desired classes.
OB: The All types dialog displays obfuscated class names.
EB: The All types dialog should not display obfuscated class names.
SR: To address this issue, I suggest either sorting the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter or completely filtering out the obfuscated classes from the All types dialog.
